Patches.Name: FramerateLimiter
Patches.Author: SF94 and Kell
Patches.Description: Limits the framerate to 60fps. This prevents the game from running double speed or faster when a monitor has a higher refresh rate than 60hz.

Patches.Name: DisableExitPrompt
Patches.Author: Kell
Patches.Description: Disables the game's exit prompt from displaying when closing the game window.

Patches.Name: SyncLoad
Patches.Author: MainMemory
Patches.Description: Loads files synchronously, speeding it up. It may improve stability on some systems.

Patches.Name: ExtendVertexBuffer
Patches.Author: MainMemory
Patches.Description: Extends the vertex buffer for models to allow the use of higher vertex counts on models. Some mods may rely on this being enabled.

Patches.Name: ScreenFadeFix
Patches.Author: MainMemory
Patches.Description: Adjusts the Screen Fade on the result loading screen.

Patches.Name: CECarFix
Patches.Author: Kell
Patches.Description: Fixes an issue where the Trolley will sometimes appear over the player's head on some graphics chipsets/gpus, and where vehicles may not load correctly either.

Patches.Name: ParticlesFix
Patches.Author: Kell
Patches.Description: Fixes particles failing to render on certain graphics chipsets/gpus.
